Name: Desert Magic Adventures
About the game: Desert Magic Adventures is an endless arcade game with roguelike elements. Play as a brave battle mage who passes through the desert catacombs and searches for his way to freedom. Break through the crowds of dangerous enemies and improve your magic skills. Features: - Random level generation. - Leveling up the character. - Nice graphics.
